message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go down to $8000 just yet. How about we meet in the middle at $9000?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I really think that's a fair price for this product.
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go up to $8500. How about we try $9200?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $9200. I'm willing to go up to $9000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're close to your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to give up on the extra $200 just yet. How about we meet in the middle at $9100?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $9050?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I really need to stick to my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but that's as high as I can go. Please let me know if we have a deal.
